OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to await between two runs of the connector.

URLHAUS_RECENT_PAYLOADS_API_URL.description: The URL of the URLhaus API.

URLHAUS_RECENT_PAYLOADS_API_KEY.description: The API key for the URLhaus API.

URLHAUS_RECENT_PAYLOADS_COOLDOWN_SECONDS.description: The time to wait in seconds between subsequent requests.

URLHAUS_RECENT_PAYLOADS_INCLUDE_FILETYPE.description: Only download files if file type matches. (Comma separated)

URLHAUS_RECENT_PAYLOADS_INCLUDE_SIGNATUR.description: Only download files if match these Yara rules. (Comma separated)

URLHAUS_RECENT_PAYLOADS_SKIP_UNKNOWN_FIL.description: Skip files with an unknown file type.

URLHAUS_RECENT_PAYLOADS_SKIP_NULL_SIGNAT.description: Skip files that didn't match known Yara rules.

URLHAUS_RECENT_PAYLOADS_LABELS.description: Labels to apply to uploaded Artifacts. (Comma separated)

URLHAUS_RECENT_PAYLOADS_SIGNATURE_LABEL_.description: Color for Yara rule match label.

URLHAUS_RECENT_PAYLOADS_FILETYPE_LABEL_C.description: Color to use for filetype label.
